ABS +.from sentence: ABS + is a tuned ABS model with additional features .

RAS - Elman.from sentence: RAS - Elman ) is a convolution encoder and an Elman RNN decoder with attention .

Seq2seq + att.from sentence: Seq2seq + att is two - layer BiLSTM encoder and one - layer LSTM decoder equipped with attention .

lvt5 k - lsent.from sentence: lvt5 k - lsent uses temporal attention to keep track of the past attentive weights of the decoder and restrains the repetition in later sequences .

SEASS.from sentence: SEASS includes an additional selective gate to control information flow from the encoder to the decoder .

Pointer - generator.from sentence: Pointer - generator is an integrated pointer network and seq2seq model .

CGU.from sentence: CGU ) sets a convolutional gated unit and self - attention for global encoding .
